website_summaries.verdict: The best budget nano drone that offers a good balance of affordability and advanced features.
pros: Drone includes a 360-degree flip function for quick and easy stunts anytime the pilot wants to impress others
Charging the battery can take as little as 50 minutes before the drone is ready to fly
cons: Flight time on a single charge only lasts for about five continuous minutes

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and Flyies very good
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gift for kids. I got this for my son and truly it is amazing. he loves it. The drone is very tiny and flies great. It comes with 4 extra props so you can replace them once they are ready to be replaced. This is very sturdy and has prop guards so that it does not damage walls or it self once crashed. I recommend it 100%. The only thing is that the joysticks are very small and just a bit hard to control the drone with. I wished they were a bit higher than they are and had some short of grip to make controlling easy. other than that no complaints. 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jabir Patel

customer_reviews.title: Easiest drone for beginners, super fun!
customer_reviews.text: it is safe to use inside to play with my cats! The 360 loop is my favourite move! It gets stables fast . It takes 70 minutes to charge, my flying time was about 6 minutes, the wait is really worth it! Excellent toy for its price!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: 3 days later and it's trash.
customer_reviews.text: I literally got this drone 3 days ago and it does not work anymore -.- I am very disappointed. It no longer wants to fly. It tilts sideways but will not fly. I ONLY gave it two stars because the color of it and all is nice and son was able to enjoy it for 3 days but other than that it deserves no stars.
customer_reviews.author: karina r.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This is one of the best, smallest, drones I’ve ever flown! (And I’ve flown a bunch). It’s SUPER stable! Very very controllable. Great features like auto take-off/landing, headless mode, and auto flips ... I am impressed! The lights are bright and easy to see. I can’t say enough good things about this tiny drone! Don’t hesitate if you’re considering this drone! It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Luchetti

customer_reviews.title: Need to play with it more
customer_reviews.text: Over all I give this product a 3. It was a little bit hard to control. I dont know if that was just me or the product. I've never really played around with a drone before. But my kids had a lot of fun playing around with it and my dog absolutely hated it lol. Or she was terrified of it I couldn't really tell. I would like to take it outside and fly it around but where I live the weather hasn't really been the best for that. So I guess I can play around with it and see if I can get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Little Pocket Drone
customer_reviews.text: Good time with this little drone! Age restriction was 14+ so definitely not recommended for children. I bought it for my husband a big kid and he loved it! It charges for about 5 minutes of playtime,comes with extra blades in case you crash.Very easy to control and flies really well. Charging cable included buy you will need to get batteries. For the money this is a great little drone.Would make a nice gift! We bought the Gold one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Smal drone with awesome
customer_reviews.text: manual/controller/ and accessories such as landing gear, prop guards, extra blades, 2 drone batteries, USB charger for the batteries, and a small screwdriver. The controller will require 2 AA batteries which is not provided. Drone body is about 2 inches side to side and about 1 inch tall without the prop guards and landing gear installed. Everything is fairly easy to put together. The little drone is so light weight that if you crash it, it'll probably not take much damage. Also fits well in the hands and easy to operate. Overall, I like this little drone. Fun toy to play around with in the house And also in the playground
customer_reviews.author: Madelayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to fly, perfect for indoors.
customer_reviews.text: This little Syma drone will be a great gift for my nephew. I tried it out to make sure it was a decent quality, considering how cheap it was. Much to my surprise it flies very well, and it's easy to control. It's a great indoor drone. It's small size makes it very portable. I would definitely recommend this little drone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Chill

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my child because I didn't want her to crash and possibly lose my drone. This gets the job done and is fun to watch fly. I read the instructions but even after I still had a hard time connecting the drone to the remote. It kept flashing all 4 lights which meant low battery; even though i've charged it for hours already. When we did finally get it to work, it's flight time was only about less than 10 minutes. That seems fair enough I guess since my drone also has a small flying time window. It comes with extra propellers which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. Do any of these mini drones really work for more than a few days? This drone didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bluenova

customer_reviews.title: Nice little drone, flies pretty smooth and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so far... the drone is easy to operate, fast response and moves pretty nice for the size. Battery last for 5 to 7 min depending on your maneuver skills or speed you want the drone to go. One thing I dont like is the 70 min battery charging time. But it can be worse. Light weight and small size makes it easy to take anywhere. I like that it comes with a set of extra propellers. It feels well made and I like that you can fly it indoors. Overall, I like it, is a nice little drone to practice and have fun anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jags1021

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect drone for any kid trying to get into the hobby. It is super easy to fly! My 9 year old nephew easily caught on and could fly it in no time. Pros: Easy to fly Altitude hold! Auto shutoff props (in crash or landing) Cons: battery life is short 5-8min no replaceable battery for drone Overall for the price this is awesome and I don't think you can beat it. Much easier than when I started in on the hobby years ago!
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Nice litte drone, lots of fun to play with! :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone as my very first drone and didn’t want to spend too much money. Pros: - not too expensive - small and lightweight - easy to control - flashing lights, can use it in the dark - lots of fun Cons: - remote needs 4 batteries (why not just a built-in battery like the drone?) - flight time is only 5 minutes before it needs to get recharged I don’t know about the flight time of other drones, but for me 5 minutes is too short. Overall I would recommend this drone for kids and adults, it’s a lot of fun to use indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Product Reviews

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to play with! Love to auto tricks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, and it's really fun to play with it. Has a button to have the drone make a trick move which my son really loved. It is easy to control and use out of the box. Fun to have the cats chase it around the house. It seems well-built. It lasts for several minutes at a time, and doesn't take too long to charge back up. If you're interested in going and going and going, you may want a model that has replaceable batteries that you can pop in and out to keep going, otherwise you'll get 5-8 minutes of fun at a time with this at a clip.
customer_reviews.author: Dariushd

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. It was a Christmas gift for my son. The metal soldering on the charger port broke after the first charge. I guess you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: More fun than a hangover lol
customer_reviews.text: What a lot of fun, old dudes can learn to fly these drones too you know lol. Easy to control after you learn the controls and which is front and back. Certainly makes you use your brain... highly recommended for bored old dudes sitting in the garage flying ‘‘tis baby out the door and back again.... circles etc ...lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: a bit of a learning curve for beginners
customer_reviews.text: So, I've flown many other pro drones, and thought this would be a cute toy to play with... It is cute, but it wasn't as easy, when starting, it was drifting forward, then i did calibration, it drifts backward, and the trimming feature is hard to understand until I read the manual 2-3 times. It's not staying put when starting so the calibrating isn't working for me. while it's seems easy, there is a learning curve to try to adjust so it will fly or 'float' at same area... Battery life was short, 5 mins and I was like "I want more" lol
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults, easy to control
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been watching their dad fly his indoor helicopter and wanted one of their own. I thought the drone might be even more fun and I was right! It flies really well indoors and is perfectly sized for indoors. It’s great outdoors too. Even though my kids are little, once we read the manual and figured out how to use it, it was pretty easy to operate and control. They had a blast. It also seems very durable. It’s taken a few spills and made it through just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a cool little drone. This is my 1st drone I ever purchased and I can say 1st hand using a drone is not simple haha it takes some time to learn but once you get the hang of it, it's alot of fun. This drone is easy to control, simple to sync with controller and is very forgiving when you run into things which will uneventfully happen. I would definitely recommend this drone to anyone looking for their 1st drone.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or those that are not looking for techncal
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son loves this drone. It was fun right out of the box. He loves the stability and the simple controls. The challenge is in seeking to control it in difficult maneuvers. Loads of fun. Well built. Happy that it has no camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very small, fits in your palm
customer_reviews.text: This Drone is perfect for beginners, If you want to learn how to start flying. Let me tell you that you will have many crash landings like I did, or perhaps you won't be as bad as I was. But I'm glad I purchased this one before I purchased a bigger one. It is easy to use and follow the user manual, At first I was having a hard time moving it around and feeling like it would get stuck but make sure you have plenty of space for flying.
customer_reviews.author: salvador Perez

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little Drone!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and I've spent some time flying it and learning the details concerning the drone's features and how to use all of the buttons on the remote control. I've done the trim and level calibration as mentioned in the user manual and have been able to get the drone to hover practically motionless in the air when desired. Control of the drone is precise and very simple to learn. It's fantastic to fly and control this little device which performs flawlessly. My only complaint is that I wish the flying time could be longer per battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: neilth

customer_reviews.title: terrific value!! awesome drone
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! This is definitely better than any other drone at this price point. The best thing about it IMO is that it is easy to use for beginners to learn how to fly drones because it has an altitude hold mode that is easier for beginners to maneuver. Pros who already know how to fly will still have just as much control over it too. Perfect for flying indoors. I wish the battery lasted longer, but you get about 5 minutes of fun and then you have to recharge. It would be nice if you could purchase multiple batteries and swap them out to get more fly time right away!
customer_reviews.author: Will R

customer_reviews.title: Great little indoor drone.
customer_reviews.text: Got this drone for my granddaughter as a stocking stuffer and she absolutely loves it. She plays with this more than she does her main Christmas presents. She has had hours of fun with this and it has held up great. She loves teasing the dogs with it. Easy to control and easy to learn to fly. Battery only last about five minutes but it is still great fun. Seems to be very well-built and comes with spare parts. Great little drone.
customer_reviews.author: HrdCorSteelerFan

customer_reviews.title: Up up and away
customer_reviews.text: This compact bonding rool was great . My son and I sat down and we opened the box. Way to go on packaging everything neatly laid out and safely secured with the perfect layout of instructions. They were perfect size. The remote control could have been a little bigger but my hands are huge. But the hands of my sons were perfect. We watched a video on how tor fly the machine from the website and it was a at a good pace to follow along. My only concern about this toy is that the battery life is not really long. A wish there was more life to it. But the charger cord works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: CJ Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Decent Indoor Drone
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a fun indoor drone. It's well made and the colors are very nice. The battery life is mid range, not the best and the controller feels really cheap and clunky in your hands. No the most comfortable. They show it going in your pocket but there's no way this thing would survive traveling around like that, not that there's any reason to. Little disappointed it doesn't come with spare batteries. Overall, not a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: TopGun4815

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 y/o as a birthday present -- it did not disappoint! Out of the box, we were able to get it flying within minutes & after some trim adjustments she was flying on her own. I was thoroughly impressed with the build of the drone, as it seems to be very durable. Flight time is great given the small size of the unit & range is fine -- exceeding the limits of my indoor space. Having purchased many electronic devices/toys over the years, I was most impressed that it came with an ACTUAL MANUAL which was very informative and helpful. 100% would recommend for the casual flyer!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dickmann

customer_reviews.title: Pocket drone but full of fun
customer_reviews.text: I brought this drone about three weeks ago for my elever years old daughter. This is a small size drone as desccribed can fit into pocket. My daughter loves playing with this. This has a mini USB port and comes with charging cable . It is very easy to operate for kids. It gets fully charged in less than an hour and gives less about 7-10 minutes of flight time. I think, this is a perfect gift for kids. I gave four stars just because there is no camera on this drone else it is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Ravikantc

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Drone / What fun
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed the Syma X20 mini drone. I am an older first time drone user. It was easy and great fun learning to pilot the Syma X20 mini drone . The auto- takeoff / hover / auto- land feature make me feel like a more experienced drone pilot. The small size of the Syma X5A-1 drone makes it fun to travel with me when I am out and about I pull the X5A-1 out of my backpack to practice my skills as well as enjoying the different opportunities particular surroundings can provide. I enjoy flying the Syma X5A-1 drone , my smart phone is jealous. Thanks I have a new hobby
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Flips in one place without drifting of
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed great. It nicely hovered in one place at the height I set it at. I liked this better than other drones because I could leave it at the height I wanted unlike other drones where I have to hold the joystick. I loved the way it flipped in one place without drifting off, which makes it great for indoors. I have had many other drones though so far this seems the best. Most other drones would start to lean on one direction after using it just 3 or 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Sangeeta Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Small & fun...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for those who want an inexpensive drone to fly and practice with. It’s a small and Easy to control. (Don’t attempt to fly in windy days). I must say it’s cheaply made, but won’t break within a days flight. The only downside about this drone is that the battery charge in flight only last about 5 mins. ( it is rechargeable) will need 4 AAA Batteries for the remote. It’s a fun lil gadget....
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: First drone and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a drone forever but they are expense. I was looking for a beginners one that wasn’t too expense and was highly rated. I decided on this one because it was small, not that expensive, and highly rated. I’ve only had it for a day but I love it. The only issues I have are that it takes 70 minutes to charge for 5 minutes of use. The other issue is that it doesn’t have a camera. Other than those two things I am very happy! Next one I buy will have a camera!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D'Agostin

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fun little drone! For inside play only though
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this drone handles! It's really small (As you can see in the photos) which makes it incredible fast and surprisingly easy to handle. You can make it do all sorts of stunts. It gives around 5-6min of playtime (Which is not a lot) but it charges really quickly using a microUSB connection. I don't recommend using it outside because of the small size it gets very difficult to handle thanks to the wind. I give it 4 stars just because of the battery life since it let me wanting to play more with it before having to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Son Goku

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Drone!!
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is awesome and super easy to scare the cat. That's not why I bought but this what I'm using it for now. What's great is that it can take a beating because you will hit a lot stuff or your cat swats it out of the air...it was hilarious! I do wish they would explain all the buttons on the controller but for the price it's great. Also the battery runs out very quickly but that common in small drones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great little Quad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas, 2017. She loves the size and the fact that it is so easy to fly. Altitude hold works great. It can fly normal or headless. It does 360 deg flips in all directions and really doesn't lose altitude when doing so. Very responsive, and it charges fairly quickly. It is the gold model and is pretty sharp looking. I would definitely buy another one. I haven't had any issues with it so I can't directly comment on the customer service, but Syma makes a good drone, and from what I've heard their CS is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hamguy2003

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Pass on this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was contacted by the seller after posting this review. They handled the situation very well which is why I changed the star rating from a 1 to a 3. They first sent me another drone but unfortunately the controller didn’t work, I informed them of the issue and they refunded me my money. Good on them. Absolute junk. We turned it on and it immediately kept flying in one direction into walls regardless of what we were doing with the remote. Threw it away after it slammed into the wall for like the 6th time and broke a propeller
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Justice

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: I already have two of this Syma drones. I had a x5uw fpv real-time 4-channel remote control quadcopter it is bigger than the X20 pocket. I like this X20 pocket because it's very small and it fits in the palm of my hand. I could play with my child inside our home during winter. The bigger drone can be controlled with a cell phone using an app. The pocket drone can only be controlled with the RC that is included in the Box
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodguy

customer_reviews.title: charging port is poorly anchored and breaks quickly...
customer_reviews.text: Delicate port for charging... broke after only third time charging. It comes loose and pushes into the body and seems impossible to repair. Not well anchored. Otherwise this would be a really cool drone. Kid loved it and was very disappointed when it broke.
customer_reviews.author: S. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This drone is small and well builds with very good quality. It can be use indoor or outdoor with no wind. It is at a great price and it provides some spare parts and a small screwdriver for the controller to replace 4 AAA batteries that were not included. It is grate for young and old, and a very good product for beginner and leaner for remodel fly. The package looks very good and can be a nice gift. We enjoy it flying in the house and we packed the gold color that is a very looking good color.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: What a Toy for a grown adult
customer_reviews.text: When I received my first drone, I dropped all of my house chores, charged it up and put the batteries in the remote. Starting playing with it and must have crashed it a dozen of times until I can fly it on a level plane. This is a fun toy. My wife finds the whiny noise annoying but who cares! I was having a ball!!
customer_reviews.author: WarrenD

customer_reviews.title: Best drone ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is one of the best drones I have ever flown. This new style of flying where you don't focus on the throttle is great. You focus more on elevation and trim. Its little but it is fast and very responsive. Battery last longer than most. This drone is very sturdy and has taken all kinds of beatings and crashes but still have not had to replace any parts. I recommend this to anyone who wants a better way of flying.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Knowing nothing about drones I was kind of hesitant when buying. But decided to go for it and it was a pretty great decision. given that this is my first drone that I've ever bought I say that for beginners this is a great way to start. The drone is easy to control it comes with tools , extra wings Anna simple manual easy to follow. In half an hour I was doing 360 stunt flips. Overall it was a great by thank you zyma!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for learning how to fly with little risk
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice entry level drone. For the price you pay you really can't complain. it's a great way to learn how to start flying these things if you don't want to worry about wrecking an expensive piece of equipment. I highly recommend this for teenagers or just anyone looking to learn how to fly a drone.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great drone for beginners. The controls take a slight learning curve but it doesn’t take long. The control is pressure sensitive so you have to learn to adjust your finger. The drone I have has a slight lean to the right but I think it was because of some of my crashes in the beginning of my learning period. Fun to play around - I would recommend for practice before investing in a pro model.
customer_reviews.author: andrewfromcali

customer_reviews.title: Drone wouldn’t fly but our money did
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. We bought it before Christmas and decided to wait for our grandsons 02/03 to give it to him. The propellers run but there is no flying involved. We’ve tried everything and re read instructions I guess we got a lemon and we are past the date of refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone for someone who wants to learn how to fly a drone. It’s easy to fly and you can fly it inside your home or a in small area. The controls are a bit small, but intuitive to use for beginners. Be careful if it’s windy outside since it’s a small drone and a strong breeze can push it off course. I was able to get a decent amount of flying time (a total of around 5 to 6 minutes) on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Xinlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mini-drone
customer_reviews.text: I had an older mini-drone and what I found is the controls were not as responsive as I'd like them to be. This mini-drone performs MUCH better. It also came with a full set of replacement blades and bumpers, which was a nice addition. I'd recommend this for people that like drones, this one I fly in my apartment but I can also take it out to the park across the street from me. The battery life is adequate given the size of the drone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beginner's drone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect description, no gimmicks. Flies very well. This is a palm sized basic beginners drone. Was trying to fly a drone for the very first time and got it going within 5 minutes. Manual is good. They have a YouTube instruction video as well but found the enclosed manual better because could read at my pace to follow the instructions. Even my toddler enjoys watching it fly indoors & it's safe because of it's small size. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: This was really cool, flew way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was really cool, flew way better than I expected, and my son loved it. He has since lost it (flew it outside, tested how high it would go, and boy did it really go high, hasn't been seen since, but that isn't their fault, it warned to only fly inside really, so can't fault it for that). Super happy, will probably get a replacement if he still can't find it soon, very happy with this, perfect for a beginner (this was his first drone and he is only 11, and he was able to fly it right away and do some fun tricks).
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly, just wished it lasted a lil longer
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and charged it immediately. I had to read the instructions to learn how to fly it. I love how fast it goes and how accurate the remote control is with maneuvering the drone. It is easy to get the hang of how to fly it. It even does flips! My only complain is that the battery doesn't last as long. As soon as you start having some fun it seems you need to charge it again.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Da best 5 stars so smooth.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mini drone for its Price! It flies super smooth and can hover do cool flips and features headless mode. It takes an hour to charge and 5 minutes of fly time. 27 dollars is sooo cheap for such a good drone. It came with a very helpful instruction guide. There is also an option for faster flying for more experienced flyers. It came on time with no damage. I highly recommend this and once I save up my money I am gonna buy another one (I'm 12 years old ) . Please buy this product it's so awesome. It would be even cooler if it had a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Wow !! The Syma X-20 is a Easy to fly mini-drone.
customer_reviews.text: The Syma X-20 is a small agile drone that is easy to fly, it has a trim function that is easy to use. This tiny drone flew well and was very easy to trim out and fly. I was impressed by the sensitivity and capabilities of this awesome little drone. I highly recommend it as a first drone for young drone pilots or beginners, it is manuverable, very durrable and a joy to fly, it even has a trick button for flips. Children as well as adults will enjoy the flyability of this durable toy. We have several mini-drones and this drone is the best flying drone in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Skybullets

customer_reviews.title: Sweet drone
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few weeks now and I love this little drone! Syma thought enough to keep those brackets out so you can fly into things and bounce off. Fun to fly and once tuned, it addicting. Haven't taken it outside yet to put it through its paces. The drone itself feels really sturdy and feels expensive.
customer_reviews.author: D Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Did Not Work!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Would not charge directly out of box. Connection into device via USB did not work, no "charging light" came on. Don't waste your money, plus I lost $7.00 on the deal for shipping return, yes NOT FREE returns. Would never buy from this company again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is so fun! It is incredibly easy to learn and fly, and the one-key takeoff and landing really helps out. The on/off button is on the top, so when I'm pairing it with the remote I don't have to worry about messed up gyros. The remote isn't necessarily built for pilots that like to pinch the control sticks as they fly, but nonetheless it truly is a good drone!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Hard to kill....
customer_reviews.text: Not a big review writer but this drone is amazing for the money. I have bought two now, the dogs yanked the first one from mid air and bent a motor shaft, so that finally killed it but a week before that I crashed it into the pool......I assumed it was dead at that point so I took my time fishing it out. My wife the convinced me to put it in a bowl of rice to dry it out but I really didn't think it would work, but the next morning it was good as new! I have had several mini drones now but this one is 5 times as maneuverable as any I've seen....
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne E. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this drone for our son's birthday as a birthday present. It was very easy to set up and use. I really like that even if you crash it, it really can take a lot of abuse. The lights on there are very bright so you can see the Drone in the sky. for the cost it, was a great Buy. Well-built, charges is pretty quickly via USB cable. This is a lot of fun. We've used it several times and can't wait for the weather to get warm again to flight some more.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Small but fun
customer_reviews.text: I really did enjoy it and I would say it's great for kids it's not a super high quality one but it's great and it works and I wouldn't say it's built bad build quality is not amazing but it's good for what it is and it wouldn't break if you drop it on the floor Aires flight of it bad but yeah don't bashed against the wall
customer_reviews.author: C.Aber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little drone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 drones from Amazon for my daughter for Christmas. All of them were in the $20 to $35 price range and all had 4-5 star reviews. I was hoping that at least one of them would be decent. Well, this one did not disappoint! This one was the most stable and easy to fly drone of the bunch. It was of a much higher quality and seemed pretty durable. The others didn’t make it past day one! I am sending all the others back and buying another one of these. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Better-Than-Good

customer_reviews.title: Fun little gadget?
customer_reviews.text: I love playing with these little quadcopters! The coolest feature is the fact that it keeps the altitude you want it at without having to control it on the remote constantly. THis isnt the quickest little guy like the others but its very precise and accurate. Battery last roughly 5-7 minutes, it'll slowly go to the ground when its depleted. Overall worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Hosic!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap USB charging plug breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Fun while it lasted.....which was only about 4 days. Just like many other reviewers have said, the micro USB plug is very fragile and gets pushed into the drone. Without it, there is no way to charge it. Since it was broken, I took it apart to see what is causing so many people problems. There are only two little tabs(possibly solder) that hold the plug in place. Once it's off, unless you're a whiz with a soldering gun, it's broken. Plus, 1 hour charging for 5 minutes of play is only acceptable when everything else is perfect. It's a real shame too. It flies very nice and stable and my son loved flying it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Brenneman

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with, great lights. Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little device has been in our home less than 24 hours ans we hace already been having a ball with it. It has bright lights and looks very cool when it flies. My youngest daughter is home from college. She has mastered it and it flies perfectly. It looks kind of like a large housefly but with lights. It is challenging to learn at first, but once you get the hang of it, it really is hours of family fun. I will buy one with a camera next!
customer_reviews.author: HawksNest

customer_reviews.title: Fun, and fast.
customer_reviews.text: It is very fun. It is difficult to get it to hover completely still at first. Once I was comfortable with the controls it is very nimble and fun to fly. It is harder to learn than the standard helicopter but it is faster once I was comfortable with it. I would recommend it to my friends. My children also took turns flying it and were able to fly despite being younger than the recommended age.
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: FLY OUTSIDE AT YOUR OWN RISK
customer_reviews.text: This was fun for the 15 minutes that we had it. It seemed like the controller does not have good range. We took this outside and flew it about 20 feet into the air. When I tried to bring it back, the drone did not stop, and instead continued to rise and literally just flew away from us, over the next neighborhood and beyone...never to be found again. Be super careful if you take this outside, you may never get it back.
customer_reviews.author: James Geszvain

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product is for beginners. I have never used a drone before and i wanted try something small and easy so i tried this and it is pretty good. Controls and its being small helps you carry around and use it perfectly. At first it is kinda hard but after you get used to it it becomes pretty easy you just need practice.
customer_reviews.author: Volkan V

customer_reviews.title: Small and Fun..Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is like a fun sized drone. Its perfect for a gift or just playing around with inside the house. After about a five minute learning curve I went from flying it in the house to doing flips with it in the front yard. The battery last about 5-8 minutes of steady flying time and its a pretty fast recharge. This does not have a camera mounted on it. This will be my go to gift for all the kids in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Family

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: It looked to be brand new, but when i tried to fly it for the first time it did not work.. Batteries were fully charged, it just didnt work at all. very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rampn

customer_reviews.title: What a fun drone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He is 11 and says, "It's cool because it has super-speed, you can do cool tricks with it and it is small so it is easy to transport. The con is that the battery only lasts about 5 minutes and then you have to charge it for 15 minutes to get it to go again." I think this is a really fun toy...let's see how long it will last. So far he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: A Joy to Fly
customer_reviews.text: Despite Christmas rush, the drone was shipped promptly. As a gift to a friend, I have had great satisfaction in seeing his enjoyment putting the drone to flight. He is thrilled with it and seemingly mastered it control without much effort. In the past he had a far more expensive drone (helicopter) - that crashed several times within 10 minutes of flight. And within 18 minutes became lost in thicket of tree tops. He commented ,this drone is a joy as it is more enjoyable and more predictable to fly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth and Compact
customer_reviews.text: This drone's controller is different than others that I have flown, but I got to say I really like it. The battery life of the drone is around 9 minutes and I was surprised at how easily my 8yr nephew was able to fly the drone. I ended up getting a 2nd one so that he could keep one and he really loves it. Played with it nonstop over the holidays. It's a really great drone all around and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of operation
customer_reviews.text: This is a no frills mini drone,it has many features that make even novice flyers easy to operate.Its also great because you can fly it indoors just as well,I would say that it is by far the best and easiest to learn to fly drone that I have owned,I would recommend it to novice or experts that seek a very compact and inexpensive mini drone.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: This is a cool little drone...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little drone toy to fly indoors. It’s fun doing flips. Read the instructions to learn how to calibrate the drone so it it flies steady. The battery lasts 5 to 7 minutes but that’s expected from a drone this small. Word of caution, do not fly the drone outside on a windy day because it will be swept away. Mine got blown away into an empty lot with long heavy grass and lost it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drone
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is actually perfect for a beginner who is just trying to learn how to control a drone. It’s pretty durable too. We’ve crashed it a few times. The only bummer is the battery life. It only flies for like 5 minutes, but like I said before, it’s a great option for someone just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana McDowell

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved this drone even though the battery doesn’t last long (great service)
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter who just turned 12. She absolutely loved this drone even though the battery doesn’t last long. Unfortunately, after just 4 days after she got it, the plug in the drone where the charging cord goes was somehow pushed inside the drone, making it useless. It was fun for 4 days. EDITED TO ADD: Jimmy from SYMA store contacted me after seeing my review and not only apologized for the issue but offered a refund as well. SPECTACULAR customer service. It is clear they wanted to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old son saved his money to buy this. It arrived and worked for about 15 minutes, charged once and then the charging port pushed into the device and it wouldn’t charge anymore. I emailed the company and they were quick to send a replacement out, but again, the replacement worked for one day and then stopped working. My son was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little drone!  Works great and is a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how stable and responsive this little drone is. Hovers in place extremely well. Make sure and do the level calibration and some minor trim may be necessary but it's not that hard. It really moves in speed 2 mode! Flies better than the larger Syma X22. Great indoor drone. I wish the flight time was longer but it's not bad considering the size, plus that's the case with all drones, even the expensive ones. They just eat batteries. Don't hesitate to buy this, you'll be happy!
customer_reviews.author: K DUB

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small drone, which is cool because if you have high ceilings like I do, you can fly it in the house. Of course, you have to be a better operator than I am, which is why I took it outside to try. It has great range, charges quickly, is very responsive, and moves very fast. Seems a little delicate for kids, but definitely for kids at heart. Great idea for a gift for Christmas, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shadra B

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is fairly intuitive with simple instructions. The flight time is around 8 minutes on the slow mode and around 5 for the faster mode. The trick function worked for all directions; so did the auto land and auto takeoff functions. The headless mode worked great, and the drone is surprisingly durable and continues to fly smoothly despite various bumps and crashes. Certainly makes the cat curious.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclops911

customer_reviews.title: Clean the props
customer_reviews.text: If this drone drops down behind any furniture be sure to check the prop for dust bunnies. I gave mine an inspection and found a fair amount wrapped around the props. Nice toy, would be nice if the battery Asked a little longer. But fun nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: tim walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone after buying 5 other drones form different brands, when I open the box I was impress of the quality and content of the user manual it explain everything in the first page, but if you read more you can learn more tips to use the drone and have more fun. I flight it almost all days inside my house I have crashed my drone more than 10 times and still flight like new. I'm also Impress how easy is to control it. The battery takes no more than 15 min to fully charge and it has a really long flight time.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and can be quite fast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my older son, but I like to use it too! It's easy to control and charges pretty fast. You can select between two flying modes. One is slow and easy to control, the other is pretty brisk and takes a steady hand, but lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: DaninBoston

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drone that can do flips and fast turns
customer_reviews.text: Simple plug and play. The instructions are easy to understand when it comes to calibrating it. Due to its size, you'll get about 5 min of flying and takes about an hour to charge. You'll need to buy 4 AAA batteries for the remote. It's really fun though, so I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ever

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an indoor drone a year ago and was disappointed and never crossed my mind to try another. Then I saw the reviews on this unit and decided to give a try and I'm glad I did. Auto take-off and hover are much better than my last experience. Syma products just seem to be a notch better than everybody else all around. I own two Syma drones and for the price, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great little flyer
customer_reviews.text: I have owned more than a few micro drones - this one's a keeper! Very steady flying characteristics and a controller that is intuitive. Ideally I would have preferred a removable battery but at this price point you can't really expect one. Flight time is exactly as advertised ~5 mins [I've included a pic of the little guy sitting on top of my 8XC to give you a size comparison.] Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Legit review, read***
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Drone. I learned, on your first flight don't fly indoors. I crashed 8 times and thought I broke it. I went to YouTube and watched a few videos. Next, took it outside with lots of room to get a feel of the controls. Now, that I understand the controls, it's SO MUCH FUN! I have zero complaints and would recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: DIYdad

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Got it working
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little drone for a few months now, tried it out when I first got it, continually crashed it into walls and furniture so I put it away. Then got in the mood to give it another try, after playing with the trim settings I finally got it where it will hover and I can actually fly it around the house without crashing. BTW .. nothing broke during all the crashing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hank

customer_reviews.title: A nice little indoor drone
customer_reviews.text: Its flight is very stable. The 360 degree flip is cool. About 8 minutes battery flight time. Charges back up pretty quickly. Pretty durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crabillac

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this drone
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone as a gift. The drone wasnt built strong. The charging port broke and sank into the drone so it couldnt be charged again. I reached out to the seller about it but he said that they couldn't ship it because they'd have to ship it from China. I do not recommend this drone. You're better off paying extra for something more sturdy EDIT: Customer service reached out to us promptly and offered another drone, free of charge. This new drone works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sakib Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Flies very well indoors
customer_reviews.text: Flies very well indoors. In just 15 min I was able to learn to fly and do laps
customer_reviews.author: Joangel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: Been playing around with this mini drone and it's very easy to fly , the 360 maneuvers are pretty neat, i recommend this product for all ages 6 and up , and i say 6 years and up because my nephews and brothers , all grown up adults been having fun with them , recommend fpr ot to flown inside , with the fans off, outside only if the wind is calm , everything is as specified by the manufacturer, planning to upgrade to a bigger sima one .
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Ramos Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. The darn thing wouldnt charge. Oh well... Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Auto altitude
customer_reviews.text: I am the first to use a drone.That required a very easy approach, and after deciding to buy the right product, we decided to buy a product called Sima. This product can fly easily because it is self-regulated. It's easy to drive because you can tell the front and back accurately by the colors that are different from the front and the back.
customer_reviews.author: cunin

customer_reviews.title: Its a fun little toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone. Its a fun little toy. Pretty easy to start flying. It's tough too; i've been learning to fly it in an area with a lot of obstacle (indoor) and it has bounced off a lot of stuff. I don't know, for 30 bucks its fun and I feel I got my money worth. I've got a tiny RC copter too and it isn't as easy or entertaining to fly as the drone.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: My niece and nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a nice starter drone. It's small which makes it easier to play with indoors. I wouldn't play with it outside when there's a breeze as it tends to carry it. It's easy enough to learn that my niece taught herself how to fly it. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Blue.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: It took me a bit of practice, but I’m pretty decent at flying this. It’s about what I expected. One of the cool things about this model is that it has guards to protect the rotors. It also comes with a few extra rotors. Like most toys of this type, it needs to be recharged after about 5 minutes of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Review for Syma X20 Mini Pocket Drone Headless Mode.  Mini drone with good control, hovers great!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time I find mini drones to be too fast, and the controls jerky. But this little drone hovers even and is easy to control. The remote is a little hard to get used to because the sticks are more like buttons, but overall its a great inside drone and good to practice with for beginners. I love Syma drones, and they keep getting better all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rickyp.

customer_reviews.title: Serious Good Clean Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most fun spontaneous purchase ever. Super fun to fly around indoor or outdoor. Great little controller with lots of functionality including flips and a fast/slow switch. Gave me the drone bug for sure at 26, but would have been in awe of something like this as a kid. Endless good clean fun, that is, once and hour, for five minutes at a time, taking account of charging.
customer_reviews.author: Null Hypothesis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very bummed,bought this for my son for Christmas. Two days later the charging port pushed Into the drone and now it is useless. Complete bummer we had high hopes
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected when ordering a nano/mini drone. I am able to hover around the house and play with my daughter. I tried the Cheerson cx-10 twice and had to return both, each time they self destructed in 4-8 minutes. The Syma X20 has excellent self protection features, rubber bouncy feet under the motors and current overflow protection. The cx-10 being so difficult to even hover at one altitude would land hard with no bounce. The cx10 flipped upside down losing contact with the controller the motors then overheated twice. I like the controller buttons instead of joysticks, I feel they are more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but still hard to fly.
customer_reviews.text: It's better then most other entry level drones but it is still very hard to fly. It is not as easy as it is made out to be. I take some of the responsibility as I am a beginner, however, this is sold as a beginner that easy to fly and it is not. Very steep learning curve. The quality is excellent as it has survived many crashes and keeps right on going.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

product_meta.title: Mini Drones for Kids or Adults, RC Drone Helicopter Toy, Easy Indoor Small Flying Toys for Boys or Girls Blue
feature_bullets: 2019 Newest Micro Drone: Small sized drone X20 is designed to be compact and portable without any overly large joysticks and built with smooth designs to slip right into your pockets or small travel bags. Mini size makes it the perfect indoor drone to easily manuever around smaller spaces.These RC Quadcopter would be great as a gift for children aged 3+.

Headless Mode:The function will orient your drone according to your controller, making flying and control easier. a good way that allows you to not worry about the drone’s direction when it flies far away.
One Key Take off / Landing & Led Light: One button press automatically taking off or landing, remote control quadcopter will take off or go back to the position where it took off (It helps to protect
360°Stunt Flip:A key 360°roll and continuous roll,allows players of any level (Beginners Intermediates Experts) to fly the drone easily with perfect control and wonderful performance.
Altitude Hold: Auto hovering is an altitude holding technology that lets the flying drone stabilize and suspend in mid-air automatically, even when you let go of the controls.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,051 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
